context: Hi how are you What type of movies do you like
Hello! What kind of movies are you into? I'm good, I hope you are well, too.
Thank you I am :) I enjoy action and comedy!! Know of any good ones ?!
Sure! If you are into action, I'd recommend seeing Beverly Hills Cop (1984) .
Oh yesss that was a great movie !!! Have you seen Inception (2010)
If you want more action than that, you could see Avengers: Infinity War (2018) I haven't seen Inception (2010) . I keep meaning to see it.
Ohh! Is it good?! I heard so many mix reviews It’s super good!! Definately have to watch it !!
I liked Avengers Grimm (2015) . Also, The Dark Knight (2008) is great for edge-of-your-seat action. I meant to say I liked Avengers: Infinity War (2018)
Exactly !!! I totally agree! Did you see Black Panther (2018) I really liked it I send it 3 times !
Oh, and comedy and action should get you to see Deadpool 2 (2018)
I haven’t seen the first one or second of deadpool
resp: I haven't caught Black Panther (2018) yet, but plan to very soon at home. Deadpool (2016) is not for the kids, but it is funny.

context.content: Hello! Do you have a preference for a specific genre or type of movie?
I'm looking for a chilling, terrifying, and suspenseful horror movie, an intriguing and suspenseful mystery, and a thrilling thriller with gripping suspense.
context.feelings: I always struggle with technical stuff. I hope this recommender can help me find the right movie. I just want something chilling, terrifying, and suspenseful. I hope they understand what I'm looking for. Let's see what they recommend.

context.content: I recommend "Psycho" for a chilling, terrifying, and suspenseful horror movie.
Can you tell me more about "Psycho"?
context.feelings: I hope this movie recommendation is what I'm looking for. I really want to find a movie that covers all the genres I'm interested in. I hope this one doesn't disappoint.

context.content: "Psycho" is a classic horror film directed by Alfred Hitchcock. It's known for its chilling atmosphere, terrifying moments, and suspenseful storyline. The movie is a must-see for any horror fan!
That sounds interesting. Can you tell me more about the storyline and the specific elements that make it chilling, terrifying, and suspenseful?
context.feelings: I'm frustrated with the technical issues, but "Psycho" sounds intriguing. I need to know more about it before deciding. The recommender seems knowledgeable, but I need to make sure "Psycho" covers all the genres I'm looking for.

context.content: "Psycho" follows the story of a secretary who embezzles money and checks into a secluded motel run by a disturbed young man named Norman Bates. The film is known for its iconic shower scene, psychological terror, and unexpected plot twists that keep viewers on the edge of their seats.
Wow, "Psycho" sounds really intriguing! I think it covers all the genres I'm looking for. I'll definitely watch it. Thanks for the recommendation! [END]
context.feelings: I feel frustrated with the technical issues, but "Psycho" seems to cover all the genres I'm looking for. The recommender did a good job explaining the chilling and terrifying elements of the movie. I think I'll accept this recommendation. [END]

simulator_dialog.resp: I haven't caught Black Panther (2018) yet, but plan to very soon at home. Deadpool (2016) is not for the kids, but it is funny.
